text: <!channel> The next Uncorked blog post is live and comes from <@U0H4SJN11>. He wrote about the important uses for drones :slightly_smiling_face: Please check it out. If you want to share it on social, you can use this bitly link: <http://bit.ly/2fVaOzG>

attachments.title: 5 Important Uses for Drones | Uncorked Studios
attachments.text: As many of us know, drones and quadcopters have taken society by storm. And with the ever increasing popularity of this technology has come some innovative ideas. However, while there are many ways to use drones, there are a few that I have found to be more important than others.
attachments.fallback: 5 Important Uses for Drones | Uncorked Studios
